TextView.android:text: For the user of the application, we took the theme from Disney’s wonderful Kung Fu Panda where the Dragon Warrior finally defeats the snow leopard Tai Lung. With a single use of his finger, ‘Skadoosh’ he accomplishes his goal. We hope that you find the touch experience in creating, delivering and taking surveys a truly empowering activity.
In order to take a survey, the presenter needs to give you a survey code. If the survey requires your name, you will need to enter that as well.
Live surveys display questions based on the presenter. So you will only see the current question being asked. The question will change when the presenter selects a new question.
